title: When was the first US coin minted, and what was it made of? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: QUESTION “When was the first US coin minted, and what was it made of?” ANSWER  The 1793 Flowing Hair Large Cent was made of pure copper, and it was the first coin made at the US Mint in Philadelphia and struck for circulation.

The first official U.S. coin minted was either a 1792 half disme minted of 90% silver and 10% copper, or a 1793 chain cent minted of nearly pure copper. Which you choose depends on how you interpret history.
